org.spongepowered.api.event.block.data

Interface BrewingStandBrewEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, BlockInventoryEvent, BrewingStandEvent, BulkItemResultEvent, CauseTracked, Event, GameEvent, InventoryEvent, TileEntityEvent

    public interface BrewingStandBrewEvent
extends BrewingStandEvent, BulkItemResultEvent
    An event when a BrewingStand freshly brews ItemStacks into new potions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getSourceItems

        java.util.List<ItemStack> getSourceItems()
        Gets the orignal ItemStacks that were being brewed.
        Returns:
        The original item stacks

      • getFuelSource

        ItemStack getFuelSource()
        Gets the fuel source being brewed into the source items.

      • getBrewedItems

        java.util.List<ItemStack> getBrewedItems()
        Gets the final brewed items.
        Returns:
        The resulting brewed items

      • setBrewedItems

        void setBrewedItems(java.util.List<ItemStack> items)
        Sets the final brewed items.

        Note that the brewed items must not exceed the inventory size of the BrewingStand.

        Parameters:
        items - The newly brewed items
